ticket.title: Additional attributes on select don't appear.
ticket.original-body:
In rails 3 if I have a scope and add extra attributes on select, they won't be present in the result.
example:
@@@ ruby results=CommunityType.my_scope.select('community_types.*,communities.title as fasd') results[0].fasd #raises NoMethodError @@@
@@@ ruby my_scope implementation... scope :my_scope, lambda { includes({:communities => :memberships}) & Community.public } @@@
This was working in previous versions of rails.
